posts.postText:
Your In-Game name: __Crisis
Your Steam ID: Doesn't matter at this point
Reason: Doing only thing i can do to S Admin when he does wrong
Length of Ban: 1 day
Who banned you?: Gash
Why should we unban you?: I get rdm'd as traitor by Gash, he doesn't slay himself next round. Rdming traitor/detective is slayable offense. If u think not, Gash will ban u if u rdm him one round as traitor. I know the rules as i am moderator, after this post i prolly won't be. He seemed unusually pissed off (pms) tonight. If he wants to be mad, he needs to take his own advice and change name and do it on another server or just not play for the day.

Welcome boys and girls! This is how to   NOT   make an Unban request!

>> 
 No SteamID 
Your Steam ID: Doesn't matter at this point

 Not using the reason for the real ban 
Reason: Doing only thing i can do to S Admin when he does wrong

  Wrong information  
  Un-needed Text/Saying things not related to the ban  
  Incorrect Information  
  Raging in your post  

Why should we unban you?:   I get rdm'd as traitor by Gash  , he doesn't slay himself next round. Rdming traitor/detective is slayable offense.   If u think not, Gash will ban u if u rdm him one round as traitor.     I know the rules as i am moderator  , after this post i prolly won't be. He seemed unusually pissed off   (pms)   tonight. If he wants to be mad, he needs to take his own advice and change name and do it on another server or just not play for the day.
 

Locked.
